flawed_nl_solution:
May will be able to make 2 x 3 = <<2*3=6>>6 red scarves.
She will be able to make 3 x 6 = <<3*6=18>>18 blue scarves.
And she will be able to make 4 x 3 = <<4*3=12>>12 yellow scarves.
Therefore the total scarves she can make is 12 + 18 + 6 = <<12+18+6=63>>63.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
